subject: for travis
body:
Hello,
Here is the format of the hosts.deny file.
It looks like this:
sshd x.x.x.x
where x.x.x.x is the IP address.
So, I guess I'd just need the sshd stripped, and iptables -A INPUT -s x.x.x.x -j DROP passed to iptables.
Thanks,
